Samuel Feuer - President/CEO - Bio: – Samuel has always been fascinated with the Internet and envisioning amazing possibilities for the web. In 1998, he began working for several successful internet startup companies. Within one year, he branched off to begin his own advertising and design agency in New York City.

The company quickly experienced its ascent from an entrepreneurial venture into the global powerhouse of cutting-edge design, animation and programming that is MindSmack.com and MindSmack.tv

Samuel’s tenacious sense of business exemplifies the entrepreneurial desire to get things done. Samuel continues to work with Citigroup, American Express, IBM, MTV, Facebook and 100’s of other clients all over the world . He has been orchestrating the business side of MindSmack for over 12 years.

Fields of Experience: Internet business, management, communications, interactive advertising, 3d, animation, campaign management, branding, application development, iPhone/Facebook, widgets, focus, passion, leadership.

—-

MindSmack.com and MindSmack.tv specialize in the highest level of interactive web design, flash, animation, 3d, ad design, video, post production and web development in the world.

In business since 1996, we have won all 100’s of recognized awards including:

1st Annual DesignFirms.org Award for Doritos Web Site. 5 FWA.com Awards Cool Web Awards Kirupa Awards LunarPages.com Awards WebForumz Awards CoolHomePages.com Awards
